trans-unit.source: Represents a container for controls in a ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能区中的控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示的示例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls.png "Ribbon controls") Ribbon controls The following illustration shows how some of these controls appear when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: ![功能区控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls.png "功能区控件")功能区的控件下图显示在选中时其中一些控件的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon controls that are selected](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls-selection.png "Ribbon controls that are selected") Ribbon controls that are selected
trans-unit.target: ![选定的控件的功能区](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls-selection.png "选定的控件的功能区")功能区上选定的控件

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref>对于此控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition> contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>包含指定的图像和标签与控件关联的大小和可见性信息的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"> </xref>对于此控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否承载在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件承载在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否在快速访问工具栏中承载的控件。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件承载在快速访问工具栏;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInQuickAccessToolBar*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInQuickAccessToolBar*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInQuickAccessToolBar*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 生成的可视化树<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>应用新模板时。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每当应用程序代码或内部的过程中，如重新生成布局处理过程中，调用会调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlAutomationPeer"></xref>对于此控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件作为新自动化对等对象。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the data template changes.
trans-unit.target: 数据模板更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The old data template.
trans-unit.target: 旧的数据模板。

trans-unit.source: The new data template.
trans-unit.target: 新的数据模板。
